mcq.statement: In which year did Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah become the permanent president of the All India Muslim League?
mcq.one_liner: Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah became the permanent president of the All India Muslim League in **1934**.
